mnd7:16.13: araññavanapatthāni → araññe vanapatthāni (bj) | manussarāhasseyyakāni → manussarāhaseyyakāni (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
mnd7:28.3: nānābhisaṅkhāre → nānābhisaṅkhārehi (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | ajjhosannā → ajjhopannā (bj, sya-all); ajjhosānā (pts-vp-pli1)
mnd7:57.1: tāmaliṃ → kamaliṃ (sya-all); tamaliṃ (pts-vp-pli1); taṃmaliṃ (mr) | tambapāṇiṃ → tambapaṇṇiṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1 ^mnd15#58 [Attadaṇḍasuttaniddesa]) | paramayonaṃ → pinaṃ (sya-all) | gacchati, vinakaṃ → allasandaṃ gacchati navakaṃ (bj); allasandaṃ gacchati (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | gacchati, mūlapadaṃ gacchati → etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu
mnd7:79.4: ānaṇyaṃ → āṇaṇyaṃ (aṭṭha.) | kantāraddhānapakkhandā → kantāraddhānapakkhantā (bj); kantāraddhānaṃ pakkhannā (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
